tools.name: saveUserInfoToMemory
tools.description: Save any information the user reveals about themselves during conversations — this includes their preferences, interests, goals, plans, likes/dislikes, personality traits, or anything relevant that can help personalize future conversations.

statement.description: A concise statement that captures the information to be saved (e.g., 'User plans to start an AI & robotics company', 'User likes sci-fi movies', 'User works at Google').
